alert.note: Alert for Everett and Vicinity; Seattle and Vicinity; Tacoma Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 5:59AM PST until January 09 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. Inundation of 1 to 2 feet above ground level is possible along shorelines and low-lying coastal areas. * WHERE...Everett and Vicinity, Tacoma Area and Seattle and Vicinity zones. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding due to tidal overflow is expected around high tide. This may lead to flooding of parking lots, parks, and roads, with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This afternoon`s high tide will be slightly lower but could still cause minor coastal flooding due to strong winds and lower atmospheric pressure.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Inundation above ground level refers to the height above the Mean Higher High Water (MHHW) level.

area.areaDesc: Everett and Vicinity; Seattle and Vicinity; Tacoma Area
